title: Letterpress Printing on the Vandercook Press, a Course at the Cooper Union
content: This summer Dan Morris is going to teach letterpress printing at the Cooper Union. He is a very cool guy and he has helped bringing our printshop up to speed. I think that this class could be great for the type obsessed here in the New York area. I am certainly going to try to get into this class and thought I should advertise it here. Read more on [TypEdu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419203355/http:/www.typedu.org/dynamic/blog/letterpress_course_cooper_union).
author: Hannes Famira
